meanings.sent1: After the storm, they repowered the house with electricity.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic repowered the car engine to make it run smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The superhero repowered his laser eyes just in time to defeat the villain.
meanings.sent4: The sun repowered the solar panels, giving energy to the entire building.
meanings.sent5: The wind turbines were repowered by the strong gusts, generating electricity for the town.

meanings.definition: To provide with a new power source.
meanings.sent1: The company repowered their factory with eco-friendly solar panels.
meanings.sent2: The engineer repowered the remote village with a wind turbine.
meanings.sent3: The magician repowered his wand with a magical crystal for the grand finale.
meanings.sent4: The old train station was repowered by a modern generator, bringing light to the platform.
meanings.sent5: The spaceship was repowered with a new fuel source for its journey to the stars.
